Name: Ceduna Community/School Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-4pm, Thurs 9am-5:30 pm and 7-9pm, Sat 9-11am; closed Sun and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3 and photographs.

About.Access: 1 day's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Acquisitions relate to local history in Far West of South Australia from Fowlers Bay to Smoky Bay. (95% in-house).

Contact.Street address: Ceduna Area School, May Crescent, Ceduna 5690
